name: Iridescence (itch)
description:
• A quick little game made from scratch in 4 days for the Curdle #20 Jam "Descent into Madness,"

    Everything was made by me(Cholfy) with some level design by my girlfriend(Addy.) 
  • ( :

    Please enjoy and big thanks to Curdle for hosting these jams!
    TONS OF LOVE TO MY CHICKEN BROTHER!!!

    Can you beat my time of 1:15!?
  • CONTROLS: (I recommend using a controller)
  • WASD or ARROW KEYS to move.
  • Spacebar to jump. 
  • (Works with some controllers, "Y" is the jump on XBOX Controllers.)
